org.axiondb.jdbc
Interface AxionClob

All Superinterfaces:
Clob
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAxionClob, StringClob
public interface AxionClob
extends Clob

The JDBC Clob interface, including the JDBC 2 writing methods.

Version:
$Revision: 1.4 $ $Date: 2002/12/16 23:34:55 $
